result.title: The institutional logics of minimum income schemes in seven European countries
result.description: Cross-country comparative analysis of institutional logics of minimum income maintenance schemes and the gaps these systems may entail in protecting against risks of poverty and social exclusion. result.title: Short film about citizen's perceptions of social citizenship in Europe
result.description: A film about citizens perceptions of social citizenship and the role of Europe tentative title European citizens narratives of social citizenshipInnovative approaches to create narratives of citizen produced perspectives will be adopted to showcase ordinary or vulnerable citizens voices A team of current and former media students at OsloMet will intervieworganise video capture commentaries vox pop style from a small number of citizens of different ages social status national backgrounds and in different languages with English subtitles to offer their perceptions of social citizenship and the role of the European level
